ActCustoms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the ACCOUNTING FOR IMPORTED GOODS AND PAYMENT OF DUTIES REGULATIONS by authorizing the Minister to set a maximum limit on the total amount in customs duties and taxes that may be tendered on a credit card as a security deposit in respect of imported commercial goods.
